desc.p: Represents the Currency whose position is updated in the associated fields TOT.BUY.POS and TOT.SELL.POS.
Represents the Customer's Total Bought position for the currency in the field NET.CURRENCY.
Represents the value date for the data in the associated fields.
Multi-value field associated with the fields from VALUE.DATE to MARGIN.AMT.

Represents the Margin amount expressed in terms of Limit Currency for the currency in the field NET.CURRENCY. The Margin is applied on the Net Amount of TOT.BUY.POS and TOT.SELL.POS by applying the Percentage specified in LIMIT.REFERENCE.
Represents the Customer's Total Loss in terms of Limit Currency.
Represents the Customer's Total Profit in terms of Limit Currency.
Represents the Customer's Total Sold position for the currency in the field NET.CURRENCY.
Represents the Customer's profit / loss for the currency pair position in the associated fields CUS.BUY.CCY to CUS.SEL.POS experssed in the Limit Currency.
Represents the outstanding amount in terms of Limit Currency.
Represents the Customer's net Profit / Loss in terms of Limit Currency.

t.desc:
Live File introduced in G13.2
This file consists of
details about the Customers Profit and Loss
for each Currency-pair and Value-date combination.
This file gets updated online whenever a new FX transaction is input for those contracts where updation process is done through a routine attached and the LIMIT.REFERENCE is given in LIMIT.PARAMETER Record, and also
at End of Day during Revaluation of FX limits.
Validation Rules:
ID of LIMIT Key

desc.p: Represents the Customer Bought currency in the currency pair for the associated value date in the field VALUE.DATE.
Represents the Customer net Bought position for the currency in the field CUS.BUY.CCY on the value date in the field VALUE.DATE.
Represents the Customer Sold currency in the currency pair for the associated value date in the field VALUE.DATE.
Represents the Customer net Sold position for the currency in the field CUS.SEL.CCY on the value date in the field VALUE.DATE.
